title: This is a followup to "League wont start". Looking for either Broporo or another Riot Support.

embed.description: So I go to click on the games shortcut on my desktop, but it comes up with this error saying, and I quote "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\yaml.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error.

body:
I, and a few others, have been experiencing issues with LoL starting up. I haven't even played the tutorial yet, and that's not a very good first impression. I get this is a f2p game, but from it being one of the most popular games in the world, I'd expect it to not crash due to it's own files. I have a link to the original discussion I was getting support from with Broporo, but when I followed Broporo's advice, it brought up an even larger error, and I tried to get Broporo's help again. He did not return. I also have a ticket to support that hasn't been noticed by anyone. Please, if you want to help me, stick around, because I don't want another Broporo incident.

My ticket: [](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/31911478)

replies.body:
Sorry that it felt like I was ignoring you, I actually kind of freaked when you mentioned that! Looking back to the other posts, you never actually replied to my comment which is why I was never notified. Please remember to click **REPLY** on my comment if you need to get my attention ^_^!!

It sounds like the usual fix that works for these dll issues didn't seem to work for some reason, so let's get you in touch with our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to walk you through some more in-depth steps to get this fixed up!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lwuOBtn7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-25T20:51:07.374+0000)
>
> Sorry that it felt like I was ignoring you, I actually kind of freaked when you mentioned that! Looking back to the other posts, you never actually replied to my comment which is why I was never notified. Please remember to click **REPLY** on my comment if you need to get my attention ^_^!!
> 
> It sounds like the usual fix that works for these dll issues didn't seem to work for some reason, so let's get you in touch with our techies in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to walk you through some more in-depth steps to get this fixed up!

I actually have had a ticket up, that currently includes 4 screenshots (5 if you count the failed screenshot), and what I think was the program logs. However, I reinstalled LoL to get the client back, and I haven't closed the League window since. I clicked launch, and it actually worked! I want to know how to fix it in case it happens again, so I might close it and test it the guidance they give me.

Totally forgive you for not responding! I didn't know you had to click reply :P

No worries just didn't want you thinking that I had ignored you. The basic problem is that some of those game files were corrupted or something. Deleting that file can force a more indepth repair sort of, but it sounds like that reinstall helped! Between those two options, you should be able to fix this if it happens again, and if not just hit me or the techies up in a ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lwuOBtn7,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-25T22:07:48.051+0000)
>
> No worries just didn't want you thinking that I had ignored you. The basic problem is that some of those game files were corrupted or something. Deleting that file can force a more indepth repair sort of, but it sounds like that reinstall helped! Between those two options, you should be able to fix this if it happens again, and if not just hit me or the techies up in a ticket.

Yeah, it broke again, since I tested it :(

I downloaded the HexTool Repair thing, and I'm gonna test it on League. If you want, we can move this to my ticket, because I'll be posting the .zip from the HexTool there.
We'll start handling this in your ticket, since that should be much quicker and more efficient! Be sure to send those logs from the tool so that our techies can take a look.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lwuOBtn7,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-25T22:22:46.221+0000)
>
> We'll start handling this in your ticket, since that should be much quicker and more efficient! Be sure to send those logs from the tool so that our techies can take a look.

The tool isn't installing and no one has even noticed my ticket. I had that chance to play the tutorial and I closed League :(

Your ticket has definitely been noticed, and it's a shame that we can't help everyone the moment we receive their ticket, but I promise you'll be getting an answer as soon as we can grab yours! We have to work through the tickets in the order they come in otherwise it wouldn't be very fair to others.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lwuOBtn7,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-26T00:01:35.892+0000)
>
> Your ticket has definitely been noticed, and it's a shame that we can't help everyone the moment we receive their ticket, but I promise you'll be getting an answer as soon as we can grab yours! We have to work through the tickets in the order they come in otherwise it wouldn't be very fair to others.

True, but the ticket's been up for a whole day. I don't mean to be selfish, but there couldn't have been that many people waiting before I made a ticket :/

Jeez, now I sound like the worst customer ever :P

Being one of the most played games in the world, it's not too surprising the number of tickets we get or actively have in our queues on a day to day basis ^_^.

I did want to mention one quick thing though, each time you bump or reply to that ticket before we respond to you it can actually make it take longer. Each time you respond, it can make the system think it's a new ticket and bump it all the way to the back. Be patient, don't reply anymore until you see our response, and you'll get an answer much faster.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lwuOBtn7,comment-id=000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-26T03:03:59.980+0000)
>
> Being one of the most played games in the world, it's not too surprising the number of tickets we get or actively have in our queues on a day to day basis ^_^.
> 
> I did want to mention one quick thing though, each time you bump or reply to that ticket before we respond to you it can actually make it take longer. Each time you respond, it can make the system think it's a new ticket and bump it all the way to the back. Be patient, don't reply anymore until you see our response, and you'll get an answer much faster.

Uh oh. I responded about 10 times since yesterday, lmao. If only I knew that earlier D:
No worries haha! It looks like our techies were able to respond, so make sure to check for it!
I'm just going to create a new ticket, that one is probably dead.
Aww, I closed League and it's back to the first errors. ;-;

Well snap....ignore my previous response then xD! Since this seems to be messing up so much and the usual fixes I have aren't working, go ahead and keep talking with the tech guys in your ticket and they should be able to get to the bottom of what's going on.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lwuOBtn7,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-25T22:08:54.750+0000)
>
> Well snap....ignore my previous response then xD! Since this seems to be messing up so much and the usual fixes I have aren't working, go ahead and keep talking with the tech guys in your ticket and they should be able to get to the bottom of what's going on.

Oh my god, I keep responding without knowing you responded :P
